The width and height below, are not the real width and height of the SVG element. They represent the aspect ratio you want it to have.
Nevertheless, they will determine the quantities you use for positioning stuff in it (that is, until you start using D3 scales, then it won't matter much).

x2 Aspect ratio: {{ vm.width/vm.height | number:3 }}:1

What this means is: I want its width to be {{ vm.width/vm.height | number:3 }} times as it's tall.
It also means: I want its height to be {{ vm.height/vm.width | number:3 }} times as it's wide.

Here are some common aspect ratio samples:

{{ aspectRatio.label }} {{ aspectRatio.value }}
